text: Hi all, next project night (*Thursday, November 17, 2016*) will be hosted at *ShowMyHomework* in Stratford, as we have been talking a lot about *Ember Engines* lately, we thought it would be fun to actually do it, and better yet, we can demonstrate it on big screen. Of course, this is not mandatory, so feel free to bring your own projects or to talk to the staff, come and say hello and have a browse trough the functionality of our app while enjoying a refreshment.

attachments.title: Ember London
attachments.text: Integrate Ember Engines to your <http://project.As|project.As> the ember application of Show My Homework is getting bigger and bigger, and is now divided in many sections, the developers would like to migrate those sect
